DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind placebo-controlled trial is designed to test and to compare the cardiovascular profile of paroxetine controlled release (CR) with duloxetine in outpatients with depressive symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Paroxetine and Duloxetine on Cardiovascular Measures
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind placebo-controlled study will test the hypothesis that greater reduction in heart rate variability will be associated with duloxetine than paroxetine in outpatients with major depressive disorder. We will also examine the relationship between changes in heart rate variability to the magnitude of serotonin and norepinephrine transporter occupancy produced by each drug.
DOC.criteria: Depressive symptoms Ages 2060 In good medical health and not pregnant Bipolar disorder Schizophrenia or other psychotic disorder Alcohol or other substance abuse within the last 3 months Cognitive impairment History of attempted suicide in the past 2 months and who score 4 or more on the suicide item of the MADRS
